scripts.copy-static: cp src/renderer/overlay/index.html dist/renderer/overlay/ && cp src/renderer/overlay/overlay.css dist/renderer/overlay/
scripts.clean-cache: rm -rf ~/Library/Application\ Support/ocr-overlay/Service\ Worker ~/Library/Application\ Support/ocr-overlay/Cache ~/Library/Application\ Support/ocr-overlay/Code\ Cache
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run clean-cache && electron .
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run clean-cache && electron --trace-warnings .
scripts.build:swift: cd swift && swift build -c release && cp .build/release/OCRCli ../build/ocrcli
scripts.build:all: npm run build:swift && npm run build

extendInfo.NSScreenCaptureDescription: OCR Overlay needs screen capture permission to read text from windows.
